knimeNode.name: Single Selection
knimeNode.shortDescription: Allows selecting single value from a list of String which is returned as a String flow variable.

intro.p: Allows selecting single value from a list of String which is returned as a String flow variable. The value can also be controlled from a QuickForm (KNIME WebPortal).

fullDescription.option: A descriptive label that will be shown in, for instance the web port.
Some lines of description that will be shown in the remote control form, for instance by means of a tooltip.
If the setting should be hidden in the wizard execution.
If the setting should be hidden in the sub node dialog.
Parameter identifier for external parameterization (e.g. batch execution).
The type of the selection element. This can be either radio buttons with a vertical or horizontal layout, a list or a dropdown selection.
The possible choices, each line is one possible value.

ports.outPort: Variable output with the given variable defined and the selected option as index.
